Job Description: You must have good experience in Java, J2EE, Sprint boot, Relational, NO-SQL and timeseries databases.   Experience on Message Queues (any of RabbitMQ, ActiveMQ, Kafka etc.)   Good experience on Maven or Gradle, Web services (REST and SOAP), Git   Basic understanding of Cloud Technologies, Databases, Open Source and Web technologies.   Ability to work well in a collaborative environment   Knowledge on Microservices, Docker, Kubernetes is an added advantage
